private_go_away: I never watched TV (growing up, didn't have one) and now as an adult I didn't get one until COVID19. After trying so many shows I almost gave up and unsubscribed. I felt like I was downloading negativity, sexism, and racism into my mind and I hated that. I never could have escaped poverty as a child and become a millionaire (hopefully a deca millionaire at some point in my future) if I listened to those messages. I was angry. But my sister told me to watch this. And it was so good. for so many reasons. just high quality tv. and on top of all of that, I got a good message about dark skinned women. THIS MADE ME HAPPIER THAN YOU CAN IMAGINE. I don't know if you will read this, Mindy but I pray that you will know what a difference you have made to me. 🙏🏾
